amendment.description: Amendment confirms that grazing permits or leases should not be issued to anyone who does not comply with BLM regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to issue a grazing permit or lease in contravention of section 4110.1 or 4130.1-1(b) of title 43, Code of Federal Regulations.
